original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ63
overview: A video taken when the woman of the contributor came to visit the neighborhood park with her son on a holiday. When the poster approaches his son sitting on the edge of the pond, he can see a small hand and something coming out of the surface of the water. In addition, after that, when the poster points the camera at his son again, something like a woman's raw neck is reflected above him ...
title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 63
